title: N172 Wilbert Robinson X3 For Sale
author: BKasarda

posts.post_title: N172 Wilbert Robinson X3 For Sale
posts.post_content: Now I have one Robby left. It has a great photo. Jay Miller has Robby listed as the 2nd toughest HoFer to find. The one SGC 20 for sale is hands above head and is now 1300 or best offer. The ungraded ones are gone. The graded Robby catching hands chest high is gone.Thanks for looking Bruce Kasarda
